## Histogram showing the percent each country has contributed to the conflict
```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/Andres/Dropbox (rex)/Grad School/Working Papers/Tek_alliances")

troops <- read.csv("Data/dv_troops.csv")

troops_subset <- subset(troops, troops_total > 0)

ratios <- troops_subset$isaf_ratio*100

par(cex.main = 1.5, mar = c(5, 6, 4, 5) + 0.1, mgp = c(3.5, 1, 0), cex.lab = 1.5 , font.lab = 2, cex.axis = 1.3, bty = "n", las = 1)
hist(ratios, , freq = FALSE, main = "Troop Contributions to ISAF (2001)", xlab = "", ylab = " ", xlim = c(0, .8), axes = FALSE, col = "grey")
axis(1, seq(0, 0.8, by = .1))
axis(2, labels = FALSE, lwd.ticks = 0)
rug(jitter(ratios))
mtext("Percent of Armed Forces", side = 1, line = 2.5, cex = 1.5, font = 2)
mtext("Density of Countries", side = 2, line = 3, cex = 1.5, font = 2, las = 0)
lines(density(ratios), lwd = 2)
```
